notes:
My favourite card by far is the [Possessed Skaab]; however, you pretty much don't want to pick a gold card first, and people seem to be so afraid of non-agressive decks that if you're supposed to be in U/B you can pick them up on the wheel.

[Skysnare Spider] is the pick because it's huge and board dominating. [Claustrophobia] is the runner up as it's a decent removal spell even though it has pretty exacting colour requirements.
